translation.en: [man 1] This is your last chance
to stop something very unpleasant from happening.
translation.es: de evitar que suceda algo muy desagradable.

translation.en: Wanna tell us where you hid the extra, Lyle?
translation.es: ¿Nos dices dónde escondiste el resto, Lyle?

translation.en: [Lyle] Eli, I'm sorry, mate.
[man 1] Talk to me, Lyle!
I'm sorry, Frankie.
[man 1] Get him outta here.
-[Lyle wails] -[Frankie shouts] Lyle! Lyle! Lyle! Lyle!
[man 2] Little shit.
[Lyle] No, no, no! Stop hitting me!
-Call the police, somebody! -[man 2] Come on!
Somebody call the cops!
Don't put me in the fucking trunk! -Shut up! -Put me in the back seat!
translation.es: ¡No me metan al maldito baúl! ¡Iré en el asiento trasero!

translation.en: Get in! Shit.
I love you, Frankie!
Shut up!
No, no, no, no…
[man 2] Don't fuck with Ivan Kroll, ya fuckin' idiot.
translation.es: No jodas con Ivan Kroll, maldito gusano.

translation.en: [Lyle] What the fuck?
Fuckin'…
Wait!
[Eli] You know, life is really different when you grow up in a family of outlaws.
translation.es: La vida es muy diferente cuando creces en una familia de forajidos.

translation.en: [Eli] But even in a town like Darra,
translation.es: Pero hasta en un pueblo como Darra,

translation.en: you still have school, homework, and doing what grown-ups say.
translation.es: tienes la escuela, la tarea y hacer lo que dicen los adultos.

translation.en: Although I reckon grown-ups can get confused,
to make the kind of bad decisions that land them in jail.
translation.es: y tomar decisiones que los lleven a la cárcel.

translation.en: Boys, wake up.
Slim'll be here soon.
Wake up.
[Eli] So I need to help my mum and stepdad avoid making those mistakes again,
translation.es: Debo ayudar a mi mamá y padrastro a no cometer esos errores otra vez

translation.en: and stay on the straight and narrow.
-Mum, mum! Guess what! -What?
[Eli] Slim's gonna let me go down the main road this time.
translation.es: Slim me dejará ir por la calle principal.

translation.en: -[Frankie] Well, I trust you. -[Eli chuckles]
And he reckons I'm a much better driver than Lyle.
translation.es: Cree que soy mucho mejor que Lyle.

translation.en: Wow.
[Eli] What you makin'?
You know, I'm not entirely sure yet.
Maybe ask me later.
Looks good though.
Thanks.
[Eli] Our mum really is the best in the world.
translation.es: Nuestra mamá es la mejor del mundo.

translation.en: She's always tryin' to do what's best for me and my brother Gus,
translation.es: Siempre trata de hacer lo mejor para mí y mi hermano Gus

translation.en: and we're tryin' to get the best for her.
Her only fault is being too trusting of people,
translation.es: Su único defecto es confiar demasiado,

translation.en: but I'm not sure that's a fault.
translation.es: pero no sé si eso es un defecto.

translation.en: Reckon the little fella wants to drive, eh?
translation.es: Creo que el pequeño quiere conducir.

translation.en: [Eli] The idea of writing this letter actually came from Slim Halliday,
translation.es: La idea de escribir esta carta vino de Slim Halliday,

translation.en: who you'd know from when he was in Boggo Road Gaol for murder.
translation.es: que estuvo en Boggo Road Gaol por asesinato.

translation.en: Our step-dad Lyle met Slim in prison as well,
translation.es: Nuestro padrastro Lyle también conoció a Slim en prisión

translation.en: and these days, we call Slim our babysitter.
translation.es: y ahora llamamos a Slim nuestro niñero.

translation.en: Come on, budge up, then.
You all right? What's Gus writin'?
[Eli] A lot of what my brother writes comes true eventually.
translation.es: Mucho de lo que escribe mi hermano se hace realidad.

translation.en: He's probably the smartest person in the whole of Australia.
translation.es: Debe ser la persona más inteligente de toda Australia.

translation.en: But he hasn't actually spoken since he was seven years old.
translation.es: Pero no habla desde que tenía siete años.

translation.en: "Your end is a dead blue wren."
translation.es: "Tu fin es un pájaro azul muerto".

translation.en: [Slim] Your what?
I dunno. None of it makes sense till after it's happened.
translation.es: No sé. No tiene sentido hasta luego de que pasa.

translation.en: Okay, let's get goin'.
Remember what I told ya. Clutch in, ignition on.
Okay. Okay. Up into first.
-[grinding] -And then stead'ly on the peddly.
translation.es: Y luego tranquilidad en el pedal.

translation.en: Like that.
[Slim] Hey, come on.
-Let's get on the road. -Hey!
-You’re doing well, eh. -Oh!
That's it, hold it.
[woman 1] Jesus Christ!
[Slim] Whoa.
Yep. Now you're drivin'.
[Eli] So I started writing to Alex Bermuda.
translation.es: Comencé a escribirle a Alex Bermuda.

translation.en: Like you said, he's only got four more years in prison if he keeps out of trouble.
translation.es: Le quedan cuatro años de prisión si no se mete en problemas.

translation.en: [Slim] Yeah, well, that's a big "if."
[Eli] Is it really boring in prison?
'Cause I was wondering how you lasted 25 years.
translation.es: Porque me preguntaba cómo aguantaste 25 años.

translation.en: [woman 2] Learn to fucking drive!
One thing you learn is how to master time.
Slow it all down by focusing on the details
translation.es: El tiempo no pasa si ves los detalles

translation.en: or you can speed it up by being so busy, not enough hours in the day.
translation.es: o se acelera si estás ocupado. No hay suficientes horas.

translation.en: Busy with what?
[Slim] Collecting cockroach shit, so you can sign your name with it.
translation.es: Juntando cucarachas para escribir tu nombre con ellas.

translation.en: Make your bed, read some chapters of your book,
translation.es: Haces tu cama, lees tu libro,

translation.en: play yourself at chess, then play the winner.
translation.es: juegas solo al ajedrez y con el ganador.

translation.en: Go fishin' in your mind, down off Redcliffe Jetty.
translation.es: Vas a pescar en tu mente a Redcliffe Jetty.

translation.en: Catch a big bloody flathead, cook it,
translation.es: Pescas un cabeza chata, lo cocinas

translation.en: watch the sun go down.
-Brake. -Do what?
Brake!
Now you know what "give way" means.
Okay. Gear stick into neutral.
translation.es: Bien. Palanca de cambios en punto muerto.

translation.en: Ignition on.
Stead'ly on the peddly.
[Eli] According to Slim,
staying on the right side of the law is just like driving.
translation.es: respetar la ley es como conducir.

translation.en: [imitates Slim] "Stead'ly on the peddly."
Lyle!
Lyle, did you see me driving?
I was full-on driving!
Yeah, mate. Hey. You'll make a bloody good driver one day, you will.
translation.es: Sí, amigo. Oye. Serás un maldito buen conductor algún día.

translation.en: -[Slim] Better driver than you, mate. -[Lyle] Right-o, Slim.
translation.es: - Mejor que tú, amigo. - Bien, Slim.

translation.en: Cheers.
Hey, mate, what you got on tonight?
Frankie, she's doing her Jane Fonda class,
translation.es: Frankie tiene su clase de Jane Fonda

translation.en: and I got a few things I gotta take care of.
translation.es: y tengo unas cosas que hacer.

translation.en: Wondering if you could, uh, keep an eye on the rugrats.
translation.es: Me preguntaba si podrías cuidar a los niños.

translation.en: Make sure they do their homework, you know?
Yeah, anytime.
[Lyle] Good on you, mate.
Hey, bugalugs.
Did you thank him?
-[Eli] Oh! Cheers, Slim! -Yeah, bit bloody late now.
[Eli] Mum, I drove all the way down to the cement factory.
translation.es: Mamá, conduje hasta la fábrica de cemento.

translation.en: And I learned to give way.
translation.es: Y aprendí a ceder el paso.

translation.en: [Frankie] Hey, slow down.
Wipe your feet. Stop running.
translation.es: Límpiate los pies. Deja de correr.

translation.en: Closer to home, the Brisbane drug wars take a grisly turn.
translation.es: La guerra de drogas en Brisbane da un giro espeluznante.

translation.en: Caitlyn Spies from the Courier Mail has been following the story.
translation.es: Caitlyn Spies del Courier Mail ha estado siguiendo la historia.

translation.en: All we know so far is that the body of an unidentified man was found…
translation.es: Solo sabemos que se halló el cuerpo de un hombre no identificado…

translation.en: Ah, Eli, turn that off.
[Caitlyn] …on a patch of waste ground near Stapleton,
missing his right arm.
Police have linked the killing to the ongoing conflict
translation.es: La policía relacionó el asesinato con los conflictos

translation.en: between rival Asian drug gangs,
and are asking anyone with any information to please come forward.
translation.es: y le piden a quien tenga información que se presente.

translation.en: -[Eli] Mum! -It's just the news, Eli.
That was Caitlyn Spies.
I don't care if it was Mikhail Gorbachev. Do your homework.
translation.es: No me importa si era Gorbachev. Haz tu tarea.

translation.en: Oh, shut up.
Boys, stop!
[chuckling] Eli, stop!
Lyle and I are going out later. Slim's babysitting.
translation.es: Lyle y yo saldremos más tarde. Slim los cuidará.

translation.en: Out where?
To the cinema.
Hey, Slim, you're in the paper.
translation.es: Oye, Slim, sales en el periódico.

translation.en: [Slim] Yeah, I saw that.
-[Eli] Is that the guy who put you away? -[Slim] Corrupt psycho that he was.
translation.es: - ¿Es el que te encarceló? - Un psicópata corrupto.

translation.en: So, did you actually kill that taxi driver, or didn't you?
[Slim] What do you think?
I dunno. I don't think you're a violent person.
translation.es: No sé. No creo que seas violento.

translation.en: [Slim] Never underestimate what any man is capable of.
translation.es: Nunca subestimes lo que un hombre puede hacer.

translation.en: So do you think Lyle's gone back to dealing smack?
I dunno. Why don't you ask him?
translation.es: No sé. ¿Por qué no le preguntas?

translation.en: I didn't wanna put him on the spot.
He's doing his best, I suppose.
translation.es: Supongo que hace lo que puede.

translation.en: You're a good kid.
You reckon?
You just, you know, keep your nose clean, stay out of trouble.
translation.es: Mantente al margen, no te metas en problemas.

translation.en: And you let Lyle deal with his own shit.
translation.es: Y deja que Lyle lidie con su propia mierda.

translation.en: [Eli] Dear Alex.
There's a lot that goes unsaid in our kind of family,
translation.es: Hay mucho que no se dice en nuestro tipo de familia,

translation.en: either from trying to protect each other or just normal head-in-the-sand kind of stuff.
translation.es: ya sea por tratar de protegernos o por no entrometernos.

translation.en: I'd be interested to see where you stand between saying too much or saying too little.
translation.es: Me interesaría saber tu posición entre decir demasiado o decir poco.

translation.en: Strikes me that both can end really badly.
translation.es: Me parece que ambos pueden terminar muy mal.

translation.en: Dear Eli, greetings from your pal Alex Bermuda
translation.es: Querido Eli: Saludos de tu amigo Alex Bermuda

translation.en: and the boys in B16.
Still can't get over you knowing Slim Halliday.
translation.es: Aún no creo que conociste a Slim Halliday.

translation.en: What a legend that man is.
In regards to getting involved in things outside of your control,
translation.es: En cuanto a involucrarte en cosas fuera de tu control,

translation.en: I've had a fair while to consider this myself.
translation.es: he tenido bastante tiempo para pensar en eso.

translation.en: We're all social beings, it's natural to wanna pitch in for your mates.
translation.es: Somos seres sociales, quieres ayudar a tus amigos.

translation.en: But then, a lot of bad decisions are made emotionally in the heat of the moment.
translation.es: Pero muchas malas decisiones se toman emocionalmente sin pensar.

translation.en: Case in point, the screws took our TV the other day for some minor misdemeanor,
translation.es: Por ejemplo, los imbéciles se llevaron nuestra TV el otro día por un delito menor

translation.en: and the result was pretty untidy.
translation.es: y eso no terminó muy bien.

translation.en: [TV announcer] Like sands in the hourglass,
translation.es: Como la arena en el reloj,

translation.en: so are the days of our lives.
translation.es: son los días de nuestras vidas.

translation.en: [Alex] You can take a con's freedom,
translation.es: Toma la libertad de un estafador,

translation.en: take his rights, take his humanity,
translation.es: toma sus derechos, toma su humanidad,

translation.en: but for God's sake,
don't take his Days of Our Lives.
translation.es: no le saques Los días de nuestras vidas.

translation.en: [Frankie] ♪ Goodbye, Ruby Tuesday ♪
[Frankie] I have to check on the kids.
translation.es: Tengo que ver a los niños.

translation.en: [Lyle] They're fine. Shh.
So, what was the movie?
The one you were at last night.
Oh yeah, it was good.
Terms of Endearment.
So, what's it about?
It's a love story.
-Does it have a happy ending? -Mm, happy and sad.
translation.es: - ¿Tiene un final feliz? - Feliz y triste.

translation.en: Eat your breakfast.
Hey, so my boss says it's all right to bring your kids to work, you know,
translation.es: Mi jefe dice que podemos llevar a nuestros hijos al trabajo

translation.en: for the show and tell at school. Good news, eh?
translation.es: para que lo cuenten en clase. Es bueno.

translation.en: Only problem is we're not your kids.
translation.es: Solo que no somos tus hijos.

translation.en: Yeah, well, it's also "bring an annoying little squirt to work" day,
translation.es: Y es día de llevar un niño molesto al trabajo

translation.en: so I reckon you both qualify. Hm…
So, what did you think of the film last night?
translation.es: ¿Qué te pareció la película de anoche?

translation.en: -What'd we-- -Terms of Endearment.
Terms of Endearment.
Yeah, it was a real good one.
Real chick flick. -Mm-hmm. -Ask your mum about it.
translation.es: Una película para chicas. Pregúntale a mamá.

translation.en: -Hey? -[Frankie] Mm-hmm?
Where's my bloody, um-- Oh, thank you.
And me--
You're the best. Mwah!
All right, I'm offski. Have a good day at school, boys.
translation.es: Me voy. Que tengan buen día en la escuela.

translation.en: You do know that's not physically possible, right?
translation.es: Sabes que no es físicamente posible.

translation.en: Yeah, well, that is why it's the best preparation for life, mate.
translation.es: Sí, bueno, por eso es la mejor preparación para la vida.

translation.en: Do you think he's dealing again?
'Cause I think he's dealing again.
Yeah, well, not if she ends up on smack again.
[Eli] Wanna take the shortcut?
Rack off, Astro Boy! This is our spot.
translation.es: ¡Fuera, Astro Boy! Este es nuestro lugar.

translation.en: Come on, Gus. Just leave it.
Yeah, go on, then.
Gus, is it? We haven't met before.
I'm Poppy Birkbeck, the guidance counselor. Take a seat.
translation.es: Soy Poppy Birkbeck, la consejera. Toma asiento.

translation.en: I have to say,
you've certainly given my predecessors plenty to think about.
translation.es: que les diste mucho en qué pensar a mis predecesores.

translation.en: I mean, everyone's agreed, there's nothing wrong with you physically.
translation.es: Todos creen que no hay nada malo en ti físicamente.

translation.en: Hearing's perfect,
and obviously nothing wrong with your brain,
translation.es: y obviamente tu cerebro no tiene nada malo

translation.en: judging by your academic record.
[breathes deeply] So… it's just the speaking we have a problem with.
translation.es: Así que el único problema es lo de hablar.

translation.en: Wonder if your artworks tell us something.
translation.es: Me pregunto si tus obras de arte nos dicen algo.

translation.en: [Poppy] This was your still life.
And this was your still life with flowers.
translation.es: Y tu naturaleza muerta con flores.

translation.en: And a lot of these pictures have
this car in there.
Family group, Last Wave.
Those kids in the back.
Is that you and your brother?
Heading where?
If you can't say it, write it.
Or… draw it.
[opening drawer] I know it may seem pointless, Gus,
but I believe you and your brother have enormous potential,
translation.es: pero creo que ambos tienen un enorme potencial,

translation.en: were it not for some past trauma.
translation.es: si no fuera por un trauma del pasado.

translation.en: It could be your mother's addiction, her leaving your father,
translation.es: Podría ser la adicción de tu madre, que haya dejado a tu padre

translation.en: or something else you've decided to keep quiet about,
translation.es: o algo más que hayas decidido callar

translation.en: in belief that silence will protect you.
translation.es: creyendo que el silencio te protegerá.

translation.en: Or someone.
And I'm here to say that silence rarely does that.
translation.es: Y debo decirte que el silencio rara vez hace eso.

translation.en: Usually makes it worse.
Draw me what you're hiding, Gus.
Hey, Tinker Bell.
Darren wants you at the back of the science lab.
translation.es: Darren dice que vayas atrás del laboratorio.

translation.en: Everything all right, Gus?
Hey. What's happening?
Hold out your hands and close your eyes.
translation.es: Muestra las manos y cierra los ojos.

translation.en: He said hold out your hands. You brain-damaged or something?
translation.es: Muestra las manos. ¿Tienes daño cerebral o algo así?

translation.en: Oh, fuckin' hell!
-[Darren] I need you to hold him. -[boy] Do what you're told, bellend.
translation.es: - Necesito que lo sostengas. - Haz lo que te dicen, bobo.

translation.en: You need to stretch him out more. One hand on his neck, one on his tail.
translation.es: Estíralo más. Una mano en el cuello, otra en la cola.

translation.en: On the bin.
Tighter on his tail. You need to wrap your fist around it.
translation.es: Aprieta la cola. Tienes que envolverla con tu puño.

translation.en: What are you gonna-- Jesus, fuck!
It's my grandfather's. Samurai steel.
translation.es: Es de mi abuelo. Acero samurái.

translation.en: You're from Vietnam, Darren.
There is no way you're descended from a samurai.
translation.es: Es imposible que desciendas de un samurái.

translation.en: [Darren] Well, my friend, that's what we're about to find out.
translation.es: Bueno, amigo, eso es lo que vamos a averiguar.

translation.en: Oh, for Christ's sake.
Don't piss your pants, I've practiced this.
translation.es: No te orines, lo he practicado.

translation.en: Stay really still, and nothing bad will happen.
translation.es: Quédate quieto y no pasará nada malo.

translation.en: Darren, this is nuts.
The mind's eye sees everything.
translation.es: El ojo de la mente lo ve todo.

translation.en: You'll hit my head or cut off one of my hands.
translation.es: Me cortarás la cabeza o una mano.

translation.en: -The true warrior does not waver. -They'll put you in juvie! [shouts]
translation.es: - Un guerrero no vacila. - ¡Irás al reformatorio!

translation.en: [man] Oi! What are you students doing?
What the bloody hell is going on here?
Those lab rats are school property.
translation.es: Esas ratas son propiedad de la escuela.

translation.en: Come with me, pal.
So answer me this, Eli Bell.
In a country such as ours,
translation.es: En un país como el nuestro,

translation.en: blessed as it is with natural advantages,
why our young folks should be so drawn to crime and petty misdemeanors?
translation.es: ¿por qué nuestros jóvenes se sienten tan atraídos por el crimen?

translation.en: Uh, I don't know, sir, but I--
I personally blame a lack of physical exercise.
translation.es: Culpo a la falta de ejercicio físico.

translation.en: What were your friends doing behind the science block in the first place?
translation.es: ¿Qué hacían tus amigos detrás del bloque de ciencias?

translation.en: Smoking?
Playing with yourselves?
Oh, they're not my friends, sir. I was--
translation.es: No son mis amigos, señor, estaba…

translation.en: Don't lie to me, Eli. You're really not very good at it.
translation.es: No me mientas, Eli. No eres muy bueno en eso.

translation.en: Who else was with you?
Oh, uh, they could've been from outside the school, actually.
translation.es: Podrían ser de fuera de la escuela.

translation.en: One was big and fat and the other was a little Vietnamese guy.
translation.es: Uno era grande y gordo y el otro era vietnamita.

translation.en: Yes, well, that's a fair description of half of my PE class.
translation.es: Buena descripción de la mitad de educación física.

translation.en: I'm gonna need names.
Drop your strides.
Uh, my-- my what, sir?
Your shorts, off.
All right, now bend over.
Come on! Bend over.
I'm not gonna tell you it won't hurt, 'cause hurting is the point.
translation.es: No te diré que no dolerá porque el objetivo es que duela.

translation.en: Punishment will cease when you tell me the name of your co-conspirators.
translation.es: El castigo cesará cuando digas el nombre de tus cómplices.

translation.en: Mm, my what, sir?
Why does no one speak English? Your partners in crime.
translation.es: ¿Por qué nadie habla bien? Tus compañeros.

translation.en: -Your associates! -Ah! Jesus.
Jesus, I'm quite convinced,
-was neither fat nor Vietnamese. -[groaning]
translation.es: de que no era ni gordo ni vietnamita.

translation.en: Do we have a name yet?
[Alex] Regarding on how to deal with bullies, you really only have two options.
translation.es: En cuanto a cómo lidiar con los abusones, solo tienes dos opciones.

translation.en: Either keep out of their way or take matters into your own hands.
translation.es: Mantenerte fuera de su camino o tomar el asunto en tus propias manos.

translation.en: [Alex] Problem with option two being
you never know how that's all going to end.
translation.es: es que nunca sabes cómo va a terminar.

translation.en: So the closer I get to being released, the more I adhere to the prisoner's code.
translation.es: Cuanto más me acerco a mi liberación, más me adhiero al código de prisioneros.

translation.en: Stay out of it,
don't rat on mates,
keep your trap shut.
Your silence is admirable, but it's misguided.
translation.es: Tu silencio es admirable, pero es un error.

translation.en: I already know the answer, I just wanna hear you say it.
translation.es: Ya sé la respuesta, solo quiero oírte decirla.

translation.en: Very well.
Mum, Lyle?
Mum?
Gus, we shouldn't.
Lyle'll kill us if he finds us in here.
translation.es: Lyle nos matará si nos encuentra aquí.

translation.en: Gus, we can't!
No one's been here since the thing with Mum.
translation.es: Nadie estuvo aquí desde lo de mamá.

translation.en: [Eli] Come back.
-What are we supposed to do with Mum? -[Lyle] Sorry, mate.
-Lyle! -I'll be back, I-- I promise.
Lyle!
[Lyle] I gotta get myself straightened out. I'll be back, I promise, mate.
translation.es: Tengo que desintoxicarme, ¿sí? Volveré, te lo prometo, amigo.

translation.en: [echoes] I'm sorry, mate!
Lyle!
Gus!
Gus, Lyle's back!
-Lyle! -Hey!
Hello, mate! [laughs]
Let me look at you.
How's Frankie?
Still pretty bad.
All right, let's go get her sorted. [echoes]
[Frankie] Boys, boys, boys, boys…
Boys!
Boys! Boys! [screaming]
[screaming] You fucking arsehole! Fuck!
You're a fucking pig! Fuck!
I fucking hate you!
[Frankie sobbing] Boys, help me! Boys!
Don't do this to me. Don't do this to me.
-Please. -[Lyle] Boys, it's gonna be all right.
translation.es: - Por favor. - Chicos, todo va a estar bien.

translation.en: Boys. Boys.
I know you can fucking hear me!
Fuck you! Fuck you all!
translation.es: ¡Váyanse a la mierda! ¡Váyanse todos a la mierda!

translation.en: Fuck! Fuck you! [echoes]
How did you know about this?
This is insane.
For what? What are we waiting for?
[Eli] Don't answer it!
[man] Eli.
-Eli? -Who is this?
I'll give you three guesses.
No idea. Is this Alex?
There's a million Alexes.
He's my pen friend, doing time in Boggo Road Gaol.
translation.es: Mi amigo por correo. Y está en Boggo Road Gaol.

translation.en: Slim introduced us.
I guess any friend of the taxi driver killer…
translation.es: Un amigo del asesino del taxista…

translation.en: He didn't kill that guy!
If Slim's your babysitter, he'd have to say that.
translation.es: Si Slim es tu niñero, diría eso.

translation.en: My mum said he didn't, and my mum's not capable of lying.
translation.es: Mi mamá dijo que no y no es capaz de mentir.

translation.en: Everybody lies, the saints and the sinners.
translation.es: Todos mienten, los santos y los pecadores.

translation.en: The trick is knowing which one you're talking to. Good luck, Eli.
translation.es: El truco es saber con cuál estás hablando. Buena suerte, Eli.

translation.en: [Lyle] You two better not be down there.
translation.es: Será mejor que no estén ahí.

translation.en: [Eli] Oh, no! Come on, Gus.
[Lyle] Oi! You little mongrels, get back up here right now!
-Go, Gus! -Don't you do that, Gus! Gus!
-Eli! -[Eli] Go, Gus, move!
[Lyle] Get up here right now, you two little mongrels!
What's happening?
The fucking kids are in the emergency tunnel!
translation.es: ¡Los niños están en el túnel de emergencia!

translation.en: Right, boys, this is it. You're in big shit.
translation.es: Bien, se acabó. Están en graves problemas.

translation.en: What are you gonna do?
Ugh. If they don't bury themselves alive, I'll fuckin' murder 'em.
translation.es: Si no se entierran vivos, los mataré.

translation.en: Lyle, go easy on them.
translation.es: Lyle, no seas duro con ellos.

translation.en: Gus, wait for me!
Gus! Gus!
Gus, I'm stuck! Gus, come back.
[Frankie] Uh, just make sure they're safe, will ya?
translation.es: Asegúrate de que estén a salvo, ¿sí?

translation.en: [Eli] Something-- It smells like poo!
Where are we?
You're right where you belong, you little wankers.
You're very lucky you both weren't buried alive.
translation.es: Tuvieron suerte de no enterrarse vivos.

translation.en: Now come on out.
-Rack off. You'll give us a floggin'. -Dead fuckin' right, I am, mate.
translation.es: - ¡Púdrete! Nos van a golpear. - Así es, mierda.

translation.en: -Well, fuck that, then. -Don't swear!
-You just did. -Yeah, well, I'm an adult, aren't I?
translation.es: - Tú lo hiciste. - Bueno, soy un adulto, ¿no?

translation.en: You tell me, Lyle. I thought adults were supposed to learn from their mistakes.
translation.es: Tú dime, Lyle. Pensé que los adultos aprendían de sus errores.

translation.en: You and Mum are dealing again. It's the truth, innit?
translation.es: Tú y mamá están traficando otra vez, ¿no?

translation.en: Just announce it to the whole bloody neighborhood, won't you?
translation.es: Que te oiga todo el vecindario, ¿sí?

translation.en: Here. Now, get a hold of that
translation.es: Tomen. Agárrense de eso antes de contraer polio o hepatitis.

translation.en: before you both get bloody polio or hepatitis.
translation.es: Agárrense de eso antes de contraer polio o hepatitis.

translation.en: Fuck you, Lyle. We spoke to that bloke on the phone.
translation.es: Vete a la mierda. Nos llamó un tipo.

translation.en: -How come he knows my name? -What bloke?
There's no bloke on the phone. It's not even connected!
translation.es: Nadie llamó. El teléfono está desconectado.

translation.en: Me and Gus deserve some answers!
You know what? You deserve to stay down there
until you, little man, learn some bloody manners.
translation.es: hasta que tú, pequeño, aprendas modales.

translation.en: Has Lyle got Mum using again?
Fucking Lyle.
Eli!
Eli!
[Lyle] Just let her rant and rage, okay, boys?
I know it's difficult, but we just gotta wait around, okay?
translation.es: Sé que es difícil, pero debemos esperar, ¿sí?

translation.en: [Frankie] He's tryin' to kill me, Eli.
Call the cops! He's tryin' to kill me.
Call them and tell he's gonna murder me.
translation.es: Llama y diles que me va a asesinar.

translation.en: Eli!
[Lyle] You can't help her, mate.
[grunts] Hey.
Group…
Group hug.
You think he's gone out yet?
I'm sorry, Frankie.
Pretty crappy at this dad stuff.
translation.es: Soy malo en esto de ser papá.

translation.en: You're great, Lyle.
We'd have been up shit creek without a paddle
translation.es: Estaríamos en un río de mierda sin remos

translation.en: if you hadn't given us a home.
translation.es: si no nos dabas un hogar.

translation.en: -Not much of a home though, is it? -Yes, it is.
translation.es: - No es un gran hogar, ¿verdad? - Sí lo es.

translation.en: The boys worship you.
And I kinda like you too.
translation.es: Y a mí también me agradas.

translation.en: [Eli] Come on, give me a leg up. Come on, Gus…
Don't, Gus! I'm falling!
Gus! [grunts]
[Eli] Come on, Gus, push!
Ah, where are the bloody buttons on this thing?
You boys learned your lesson?
Is Lyle still mad at us?
Yeah, no, he's settled. He's watching the footy.
translation.es: No, se calmó. Está viendo fútbol.

translation.en: So he's not gonna flog us?
Not if you say you're sorry.
translation.es: No si dicen que lo sienten.

translation.en: "Act of having it off," ten letters.
Something, something, "P," something, "T."
Amputation.
-[Eli] Mum. -[Frankie] Mm?
Just promise you and Lyle aren't using again.
I promise.
"Family embrace," five and three.
Excuse me.
-[kisses] -Good night.
Why did you run away from our dad?
[Frankie] Eli, it's late. I don't wanna talk about Robert right now.
translation.es: Eli, es tarde. No quiero hablar de Robert ahora.

translation.en: He did bad things, didn't he?
We all do bad things sometimes.
translation.es: Todos hacemos cosas malas a veces.

translation.en: Alcoholism is a disease.
He wasn't a well man.
Was he a good man?
He was a good dancer.
-Was he more like me or more like Gus? -I don't know, Eli.
translation.es: - ¿Era más como yo o como Gus? - No sé, Eli.

translation.en: He was… like both of you.
Was he scary sometimes?
Like Gus is scary.
Gus isn't scary.
Yes, he is.
Yeah? In what way?
I dunno. It's the stuff he writes in the air with his magic finger.
translation.es: No sé. Es lo que escribe en el aire con su dedo mágico.

translation.en: It's like he can hop forwards through time and send back messages from the future.
translation.es: Es como si pudiera viajar en el tiempo y enviar mensajes del futuro.

translation.en: Maybe he can.
You ever considered that possibility?
All I know is that boy loves you more than he can say.
translation.es: Solo sé que te quiere más de lo que puede decir.

translation.en: When you were born, he guarded your crib like all human life depended on it.
translation.es: Cuando naciste, cuidó tu cuna como si la humanidad dependiera de ello.

translation.en: He's the best friend you'll ever have.
translation.es: Es el mejor amigo que tendrás.

translation.en: And you're the best mum.
translation.es: Y tú eres la mejor mamá.

translation.en: Nah.
Probably a bit below average, but that's very kind of you to say.
translation.es: Estoy debajo del promedio, pero muy amable de tu parte.

translation.en: No, really, you're too good for this shitty place.
translation.es: No, eres muy buena para este lugar de mierda.

translation.en: You were too good for Dad, and now you're too good for Lyle.
translation.es: Demasiado para papá y ahora para Lyle.

translation.en: [Frankie] Don't.
[Eli] You could've been a teacher or a school counselor,
translation.es: Pudiste ser maestra o consejera escolar,

translation.en: not living with some drop-kick heroin pusher.
translation.es: no vivir con un traficante de heroína.

translation.en: That's enough. Go to bed.
[whispering] I'm going after him.
Check where he goes. You coming?
[Darren] Don't move.
Tink, if you're gonna be a ninja, last thing you wanna wear
translation.es: Campanita, como ninja, lo último que quieres usar

translation.en: is blue pajamas with half your arse hangin' out.
translation.es: es un pijama azul con el culo fuera.

translation.en: I can see your Aussie white bum flashing on and off like a fuckin' lighthouse.
translation.es: Veo tu culo blanco australiano titilando como un faro.

translation.en: [sighs] Hi, Darren.
You know, if I chopped your head off, your brain'd stay alive for three minutes.
translation.es: Si te corto la cabeza, tu cerebro vive tres minutos.

translation.en: You could carry on talking till you lost all consciousness.
translation.es: Podrías hablar hasta perder el conocimiento.

translation.en: I don't think that's true.
Only one way to find out.
Did you shit yourself?
Almost.
What's Lyle doing here?
I reckon he's collecting heroin from your mum.
translation.es: Creo que tu mamá le está dando heroína.

translation.en: Very good, bellend. Who else knows what he's up to?
translation.es: Muy bien, bobo. ¿Quién más sabe lo que trama?

translation.en: The guy on the phone, maybe.
What guy on the phone?
There was a guy on the phone. I spoke to him by accident.
translation.es: Un tipo al teléfono. Hablé con él por accidente.

translation.en: He seemed to know what was going on.
Could've been Ivan Kroll.
-Who's Ivan Kroll? -Just an arsehole with a motorbike.
translation.es: - ¿Quién es Ivan Kroll? - Un imbécil con una moto.

translation.en: You see on the news about that bloke who lost an arm?
translation.es: ¿Viste la noticia del que perdió un brazo?

translation.en: That was probably Ivan's work.
Wanna eat something?
-I'll be all right. -You better come in.
Be rude not to.
Shoes off, dick wad.
Check this out.
Go on, have a look.
[woman] …so much money. It's the best.
[Eli] So when did Lyle go back to dealing smack?
[Darren] What makes you think he ever stopped? He just moved up the ladder.
translation.es: ¿Qué te hace pensar que había parado? Subió de nivel.

translation.en: Sucks, doesn't it? Thinking you're with the good guys
translation.es: Apesta, ¿no? Pensar que estás con los buenos

translation.en: and discovering you're the bad guys.
translation.es: y ver que eres de los malos.

translation.en: [woman] Darren!
-Come, she'd like to meet you. -Oi!
Found this one spying in the yard.
translation.es: Lo hallé espiando en el jardín.

translation.en: -The one who didn't rat about the rat. -Eli, what are you doin' here?
translation.es: - El que no delató lo de la rata. - Eli, ¿qué haces aquí?

translation.en: Darren invited me.
It's 1:00 in the morning. Go home!
translation.es: Es la 1:00 a. m. ¡Vete a casa!

translation.en: -'Kay, I'm going. -You always give up that easy?
translation.es: - Bueno, me voy. - ¿Siempre te rindes tan fácil?

translation.en: Why did you come here?
Because he's an idiot.
-Just followed Lyle. -[Lyle] Mm.
Because?
You have question for him.
-Okay, that's enough, guys. -I say when it's enough.
Okay.
Come here, boy.
Closer.
Why don't you ask Lyle
translation.es: ¿Por qué no le haces a Lyle

translation.en: your most important question?
I'll make sure that he answer truthfully.
translation.es: Me aseguraré de que diga la verdad.

translation.en: Why are you dealing drugs again?
-For the money, mate. -So why are we still poor?
translation.es: - El dinero. - ¿Y por qué aún somos pobres?

translation.en: I said one question.
Now it's my turn.
Why didn't you rat on my son?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no delataste a mi hijo?

translation.en: It's the prisoner's code. Stay out of it, keep your trap shut.
translation.es: Es el código de los presos. No te metas, mantén la boca cerrada.

translation.en: [woman] You taught him well.
You can both leave now.
Okay.
Bring him back another time.
Maybe we talk about work opportunity.
translation.es: Tal vez hablemos de una oportunidad de trabajo.

translation.en: Okay, thank you.
[woman] Eli?
When he say it just for the money,
translation.es: Cuando dice que es solo por el dinero,

translation.en: the money is for your family.
translation.es: el dinero es para tu familia.

translation.en: He's doing this because he loves you.
[in Vietnamese] Off to bed.
[in English] Lyle.
Lyle, come back.
Please, Lyle!
Don't you ever follow me again, you hear?
-[Eli] Lyle! Lyle! -[Lyle] That was really embarrassing.
[crying] You're embarrassed? Lyle, you're a fucking drug dealer!
I mean, what the fuck is it with you and Mum?
"Do your homework! Eat your broccoli! Tidy the kitchen!"
translation.es: "¡Haz tu tarea! ¡Cómete el brócoli! ¡Limpia la cocina!".

translation.en: I mean, like, Mum's an addict,
translation.es: "¡Haz tu tarea! ¡Cómete el brócoli! ¡Limpia la cocina!". ¡Mamá es una adicta y tú eres el idiota que la metió en eso!

translation.en: and you're the idiot who got her hooked!
translation.es: ¡Mamá es una adicta y tú eres el idiota que la metió en eso!

translation.en: Righto, come on, let's go, mate.
Oh, what-- Get up, Eli. What are you doing? Get up.
-Get up! -I can't.
You're just gonna push me down again.
Don't cry, you great big pussy. What are you crying for?
I don't know.
I just got a whole lot of tears inside me.
translation.es: Tengo muchas lágrimas dentro de mí.

translation.en: I can't help it.
Here, clean yourself up.
Take it.
Now, I know dealin' smack is a shitty way to make a livin',
translation.es: Sé que vender droga es una forma horrible de ganarse la vida,

translation.en: but no one gets rich doing an honest job anymore.
translation.es: pero ya nadie se hace rico con un trabajo honesto.

translation.en: -That's kinda what Darren said. -Oh, did he, now?
translation.es: - Eso es lo que dijo Darren. - ¿Sí?

translation.en: Honestly.
Pretty soon, mate, we're gonna be away from this place.
translation.es: Muy pronto, amigo, estaremos lejos de este lugar.

translation.en: Things are gonna get good, I promise.
translation.es: Las cosas mejorarán, te lo prometo.

translation.en: Things are gonna get so good you'll forget they were ever bad.
translation.es: Mejorarán tanto que olvidarás que alguna vez fueron malas.

translation.en: You ever wondered why you cry so easily?
translation.es: ¿Te has preguntado por qué lloras tan fácil?

translation.en: 'Cause I'm a pussy.
No, because you're a good kid, and don't you ever be ashamed of crying.
translation.es: No, porque eres un buen chico. Y nunca te avergüences de llorar.

translation.en: You cry because you give a shit.
People that don't cry, they don't give a shit,
translation.es: A la gente que no llora no le importa.

translation.en: and God knows there's enough of them fuckwits at large in the world.
translation.es: Y Dios sabe que hay suficientes imbéciles de esos en el mundo.

translation.en: You good?
You done crying?
Yep.
All right, let's go home.
[whispering] Right, mate, straight to bed, okay?
translation.es: Bien, amigo, directo a la cama, ¿sí?

translation.en: Hey.
Mum isn't using, but Lyle's dealing like we thought.
translation.es: Mamá no está consumiendo, pero Lyle trafica como pensábamos.

translation.en: And Bich Dang offered me a job.
translation.es: Y Bich Dang me ofreció trabajo.

translation.en: I reckon we can help him.
You know, go into business together, make a shitload of money,
translation.es: Hacer negocios juntos, ganar mucho dinero,

translation.en: finally get the cash to move Mum away from here.
translation.es: al fin tener suficiente para sacar a mamá de aquí.

translation.en: What do you reckon?
I'm gonna be dead tomorrow.
[Slim] This is a test. No test is worth anything unless it's difficult to pass.
translation.es: Esto es una prueba. Ninguna prueba vale si no es difícil.

translation.en: And this is yours.
[Eli] Bobby!
You look how happy your mum is. Why would you want anyone to risk that?
translation.es: Mira lo feliz que está mamá. ¿Por qué arriesgar eso?

translation.en: Robert's your father.
Are you all right, Dad? Whoa!
[Lyle] It's gonna get better, Frankie.
It's gonna get so good you'll forget it was ever bad.
translation.es: Tanto que olvidarás que fue malo.

translation.en: [Darren] Ivan Kroll is a bogeyman to keep everyone in line.
translation.es: Ivan Kroll es un coco para tener a todos a raya.

translation.en: [Slim] Any word of Lyle?
[Eli] No, but I'll find him before anything bad happens to him.
translation.es: No, pero lo hallaré antes de que le pase algo.

translation.en: [Slim] Sometimes bad things happen to get good things.
translation.es: A veces, las cosas malas traen buenas.

translation.en: I promise you that our sacred mission has only just begun.
translation.es: Les prometo que nuestra sagrada misión apenas comienza.

translation.en: [Eli] Where's my mum?
[Slim] Your mum is in prison.
I wanna see my boys!
-Are you real? -[Eli] It's not a dream, Mum.
translation.es: - ¿Eres real? - No es un sueño, mamá.

translation.en: It's just you and me, Gus. No one's going to help us.
translation.es: Somos solo tú y yo, Gus. Nadie nos va a ayudar.

translation.en: Caitlyn Spies? I'm Eli Bell.
You and me, we're the daylight.
translation.es: Tú y yo somos la luz del día.

translation.en: [Frankie] Sending our boys out into the world, it's something to be proud of.
translation.es: Enviar a nuestros niños al mundo es algo para enorgullecerse.

translation.en: [Slim] Pain and pleasure's all part of being human.
translation.es: El dolor y el placer son parte nuestra.

translation.en: And if it doesn't hurt, not real life, mate.
translation.es: Si no duele, no en la vida real.

translation.en: All you have to do is believe.
♪ Hope it gets through ♪
